Interface IHDBManagerProjectController

All Known Implementing Classes:
HDBManagerProjectController
public interface IHDBManagerProjectController
Interface for HDBManagerProjectController defining methods for HDB manager project operations This interface follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by allowing views to depend on this abstraction rather than concrete implementations.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      String createProject(String name, String neighborhood, String applicationOpenDateStr, String applicationCloseDateStr, String availableOfficerSlotsStr, HDBManager manager)
      Creates a new project
      Parameters:
      name - Project name
      neighborhood - Project neighborhood
      applicationOpenDateStr - Application opening date (dd/MM/yyyy)
      applicationCloseDateStr - Application closing date (dd/MM/yyyy)
      availableOfficerSlotsStr - Number of available officer slots
      manager - The manager creating the project
      Returns:
      Result message indicating success or failure

    • addFlatToProject

      String addFlatToProject(String projectName, String flatType, String totalUnitsStr, String sellingPriceStr)
      Adds a flat type to a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project
      flatType - Type of flat to add
      totalUnitsStr - Total number of units
      sellingPriceStr - Selling price
      Returns:
      Result message indicating success or failure

    • updateProject

      String updateProject(String projectName, String neighborhood, String applicationOpenDateStr, String applicationCloseDateStr, String availableOfficerSlotsStr, HDBManager manager)
      Updates an existing project
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project to update
      neighborhood - Updated neighborhood
      applicationOpenDateStr - Updated application opening date (dd/MM/yyyy)
      applicationCloseDateStr - Updated application closing date (dd/MM/yyyy)
      availableOfficerSlotsStr - Updated number of available officer slots
      manager - The manager updating the project
      Returns:
      Result message indicating success or failure

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      String toggleProjectVisibility(String projectName, String visibilityStr, HDBManager manager)
      Toggles the visibility of a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - Name of the project
      visibilityStr - Visibility state ("on" or "off")
      manager - The manager toggling the visibility
      Returns:
      Result message indicating success or failure

    • getProjectsByManager

      List<Project> getProjectsByManager(HDBManager manager)
      Gets projects created by a specific manager
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager
      Returns:
      List of projects created by the manager

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets all projects in the system
      Returns:
      List of all projects

    • getProjectByName

      Project getProjectByName(String name)
      Get a project by name
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project
      Returns:
      The project, or null if not found

    • generateProjectApplicantsReport

      List<Map<String,Object>> generateProjectApplicantsReport(String projectName)
      Generates a report of all applicants for a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      List of applicant data for the report

    • generateFilteredApplicantsReport

      List<Map<String,Object>> generateFilteredApplicantsReport(String projectName, String flatType, String maritalStatus, String minAgeStr, String maxAgeStr)
      Generates a filtered report of applicants for a project
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      flatType - The flat type filter
      maritalStatus - The marital status filter
      minAgeStr - The minimum age filter
      maxAgeStr - The maximum age filter
      Returns:
      List of filtered applicant data for the report
